description: For spatial search and finding that interesting one
title: fw_core

___description.description: Text to facilitate decision to be interested or not
___description.title: Description

___short_name.description: Short name (max. 31 chars) to be shown on the map or in a narrow list
___short_name.title: Short name

___thumbnail.description: Link to a small picture to be shown on a list, scene or map. Preferably max. 256x256 pixels, e.g. 120x160.
___thumbnail.title: Thumbnail

___url.description: URL to get more info, preferably official website of the POI
___url.title: Web address

___category.description: A descriptive tag for narrowing the search: cafe, museum, etc.
___category.title: Category

___last_update.description: DO NOT EDIT! Information to identify the version of the data component.
___last_update.title: Last update

___geometry.description: Format: Open Geospatial Consortium's 'Well-known text' ISO/IEC 13249-3:2011
___geometry.title: Geometrical form of the POI

___label.description: More info to complement the name, if enough space
___label.title: Label
